# Meet the #1 Live Chat for Microsoft Teams, Google, Slack, and ChatGPT

Talking to your customers should be easy. Chat with them from the
collaboration tools you already use.  
  
Build ChatGPT powered chatbots trained on your website data and handoff chats
to human agents.

Try for Free → View Demo

Read our ChatGPT Getting Started Guide →

## Chat with visitors from:

Increase

Customer Happiness

Increase

Customer Happiness

Customer Engagement

Sales

Live chat with your website visitors from the messaging tools you already use
at your company: Microsoft Teams, Google, Slack, Zoom, or Webex.

75,000+ customers use Social Intents live chat software to grow their
businesses already. See what they love about it.

## Keep Customers Happy

Provide Incredible Customer Support

Provide real-time customer support directly through Slack, Microsoft Teams,
Google Chat, Zoom, Webex or our web-based chat console. No need to learn
additional software to support customers.

Chat from the tools you already use.

    Bring all customer communications into Microsoft Teams, Google, Slack, Webex or Zoom.

Stop context switching.

    Respond to inquiries quickly without having to switch between apps, increase customer satisfaction, and build strong customer relationships.

Get started in minutes.

    Install Social Intents Live Chat in 5 minutes.

## Build revenue

Close More Sales Online

Engage potential customers when they need your help, close more deals, and
increase online revenue.

Answer questions in real-time.

    Connect with customers when they are about to buy.

Capture leads.

    Automate your lead capture and push transcripts and leads right into your CRM, ticketing, or marketing systems.

Automate your sales process.

    Pre-qualify visitors with initial questions, automate via chatbots, and escalate to your agents when it makes sense.

## Testimonials

How Social Intents Helps These Companies Engage Customers and Website Visitors

Schedule Demo →

Chat With your Website Visitors in 3 Easy Steps

## Step 1

Connect Live Chat With Teams, Google Chat, Slack, Zoom, or Webex.

Connect Social Intents to your MS Teams, Slack, Zoom, or Webex using one of
the buttons below.

Next, select a channel, team, or space that you want to send requests to. Any
new live chat conversation will be sent here.

Try It Now →

## Step 2

Embed Live Chat Snippet On Your Website

Next, you need to ensure that your live chat widget appears on the website.
This is what customers will use to communicate with you.

To do so, embed the live chat code snippet in your web page or, in the case of
Social Intents, use dedicated plugins for Shopify, WordPress, Bigcommerce, or
Wix.

## Step 3

Answer Your Chats From Teams, Gmail, Slack, and ChatGPT.

You can start having conversations with website visitors directly from the
tools you're used to using at work. Train your chatbot on website content,
files, and PDFs.

## Everything you need for Live Chat Customer Service and Online Sales.

Pre-chat surveys, quick replies, proactive chat invites, targeting rules,
1-click chatbot training, and tons of customization options.

Customizable Chat Widget

    Canned responses, proactive chat invites, targeting rules, Zapier integration, and more.

Unlimited Team Members

    Set up as many team members as needed. No per agent pricing. Grow live chat as your team grows.

3rd Party Integrations

    Get your leads, tickets, and transcripts to your existing CRM, Ticketing, and Lead systems.

14-Day Free Trial + 100% No-Risk Guarantee!

Choose an affordable plan that’s packed with the best features for engaging
your visitors, creating customer loyalty, and driving sales.

Faqs

## Have any Questions?

Can't find the answer you're looking for? Chat with us.

Chat With Us →

Who should use Social Intents?

    Small businesses, entrepreneurs, marketers, and anyone who wants to improve their sales. Especially teams that use Microsoft Teams, Slack, Zoom, or Webex.

Is there a Free Trial?

    Yes! We offer a 14-Day free pro trial with all the bells and whistles to make sure you love the product. Cancel at any time and there are never any contracts.

Can I use live chat on multiple websites?

    Yes - absolutely! Each of our plans supports a tiered number of websites. So just pick a plan that fits your needs.

Do I have to sign a contract?

    No! There are no contracts and you can cancel at any time.

LinkedIn Twitter
